## ä½¿ç”¨

```vue
<template>
  <div class="index">
    <AmountColumn v-model="val"/>
  </div>

  components: {

    return {
      val: ''
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
.index {
  width: 300px;
  height: 80px;
  margin: 50px;
}
</style>
```
